verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron,

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w service|strong="H5656"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Kohathites \w at|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w* regards \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w things|strong="H6944"\w*.

Whenever \w the|strong="H3680"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w sets|strong="H5265"\w* \w out|strong="H5265"\w*, Aaron \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3680"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w go|strong="H3381"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w*, \w take|strong="H1121"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* \w veil|strong="H6532"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* \w curtain|strong="H4539"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* ark \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* \w Testimony|strong="H5715"\w* \f + \fr 4:5 \ft That is, the ark of the covenant\f* \w with|strong="H3381"\w* \w it|strong="H3381"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* are \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w place|strong="H7760"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covering|strong="H3681"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w fine|strong="H8476"\w* \w leather|strong="H5785"\w*,\f + \fr 4:6 \ft Possibly the hides of large aquatic mammals; also in verses 8, 10, 11, 12, 14, and 25; see Exodus 25:5.\f* \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* solid \w blue|strong="H8504"\w* cloth \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H8504"\w* \w insert|strong="H7760"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* poles.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron,

“Do not allow \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w Kohathite|strong="H6956"\w* \w tribal|strong="H7626"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w to|strong="H3881"\w* \w be|strong="H6956"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w service|strong="H5656"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w Gershonite|strong="H1649"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* regarding \w work|strong="H5656"\w* \w and|strong="H5647"\w* transport:

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w service|strong="H5656"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w Gershonite|strong="H1649"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w at|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3548"\w* \w duties|strong="H4931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w under|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w direction|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ithamar \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.
